content.p: Postgraduate loans for students from Mexico FIDERH (Fondo para el Desarrollo de Recursos Humanos) is the Bank of Mexico's trust for funding postgraduate studies. FIDERH offers student loans to Mexican students for postgraduate degree programmes in a wide variety of subject areas. See the FIDERH website for full guidance on funding and eligibility criteria. See our Mexico webpage for guidance on Nottingham's entry requirements for students from Mexico. See the FIDERH website for full details of the scholarship application process and deadlines. Offered by El Fondo para el Desarrollo de Recursos Humanos (FIDERH)
